members.name: ACCEPT_ALL
members.comment: One pre-defined policy which accepts all cookies.

members.name: ACCEPT_NONE
members.comment: One pre-defined policy which accepts no cookies.

members.name: ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER
members.comment: One pre-defined policy which only accepts cookies from original server.

members.name: shouldAccept
members.comment: Will be called to see whether or not this cookie should be accepted.

param: uri - the URI to consult accept policy with
return: true if this cookie should be accepted; otherwise, false

name: java.net.CookiePolicy
comment:
CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted and which should be rejected. Three pre-defined policy implementations are provided, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER.

See RFC 2965 sec. 3.3 and 7 for more detail.
